name: Ebay
description: This API allows you to scrape valuable product information of products in ebay.

parameters.name: _nkw
parameters.description: the name of the product, use this parameter to search corresponding products

return: The information including product title, link, condition, price and seller of the first item of the search results

example.output: product title: Kaffeto Gourmet Cafe Latte with Ganoderma Coffee 100 Sachets, product link: https://www.ebay.com/itm/255997789761?hash=item3b9aa84641:g:dqYAAOSwsJNkI3yO&amdata=enc%3AAQAIAAAAwF%2F6918zRyRzjtnJH3Z00Uq%2Bbt19Q4thuKQPsV5bu%2FzdpbLBZFDQDnYBgnedpJtB%2FmS%2BGDf6PET9b3iBHnQ38cszbeomMTF6WYbsZawI%2BTPXvftZakeDw9IDxjuGw26JZASGUGrkECu8TcYl58t%2FN5sSx87gnKPFwUrn2nxNxrTC3UOdp4JPYmLUldfilrLciXfGrEWL2YnL1cgHG8%2BQ31gAn5JSQ1Xkji3O31geihWCmFugH%2BDFAL39M7jxg7zSMQ%3D%3D%7Ctkp%3ABlBMULKvqr6LYg, condition: Brand New, price: $80.95, seller: nybase.
